attributes.action: Recognize the Tibetan government in exile and support the opening of a Tibetan consulate in the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned support the cultural,human and political rights of the Tibetan people and call on Her Majesty's government to acknowledge our historical links with Tibet by establishing direct recognition of the Tibetan government in exile. Furthermore,in pursuance of this policy,we call on the government to allow the Tibetan government in exile to establish a consulate in the United Kingdom.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
